General.Name: Qingdao Eastsoft Communic Tech
General.Description: Qingdao Eastsoft Communication Technology Co.,Ltd develops and sells power line carrier communication products in China. It provides integrated circuit boards and products, such as broadband and narrowband high-speed communication chips, as well as high-speed wireless communication chips; computing chips for the energy internet fields; and IoT-oriented MCU control chips, security chips, and carrier waves, as well as software, cloud, and information services. The company also offers meter to master station systems, including narrowband low-speed, narrow-band high-speed, and micro-power wireless combination of dual-mode fusion solutions, broadband carrier solutions, etc.; and various intelligent solutions and terminal products for the energy internet sector. In addition, it provides smart lighting systems, smart shading systems, smart security systems, smart temperature control systems, background music systems, building intercom systems, voice control systems, smart home appliance control systems, energy management system, etc.; intelligent building products and systems; and smart park products and systems, as well as terminal devices, gateways, mobile phone software, and servers. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Qingdao, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xue Fei Sun
